error.incremental_growth_only: - Incremental growth cannot be solely selected!
error.initial_nodes_non_zero: - Number of initial nodes must be non zero!

error.vertices_less_than_initial_nodes: - Number of vertices must not be less than the number of initial nodes.

error.custom_er_edges_greater_than_zero: - Number of edges must be greater than 0.

error.custom_scale_free_initial_connections_pe: - Number of initial connections per node must be non zero!
